entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 01 January 2023
